metadata.title: CVE-2022-29583 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: service_windows.go in the kardianos service package for Go omits quoting that is sometimes needed for execution of a Windows service executable from the intended directory.

notes.note: amurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-github-kardianos-service

criterions.comment: google-guest-agent package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
